snippet: The newly confirmed C.I.A. chief should commit to making a Senate report on torture public.
abstract: Editorial urges new Central Intelligence Agency chief John Brennan to commit to making Senate report on detention, interrogation and torture of Al Qaeda detainees public; contends coverup of lawbreaking perpetrated during former Pres George W Bush's administration has to stop.
lead_paragraph: The newly confirmed C.I.A. chief should commit to making a Senate report on torture public.

headline.seo: John Brennan’s Excuse on Torture Report
